nodes.id: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的机关第一级职能部门，为全军作战指挥机关，前身为中国人民解放军总参谋部。于2015年11月在深化国防和军队改革中改组成立。
description.en: A first-level functional department of the Central Military Commission, serving as the operational command headquarters for the entire military. Its predecessor was the General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army. It was reorganized and established in November 2015 during the reform of national defense and the military.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高军事领导机构，与中华人民共和国中央军事委员会合署办公。
description.en: The highest military leading body of the Communist Party of China, working together with the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家军事领导机构，与中国共产党中央军事委员会合署办公。
description.en: The supreme state military leading body of the People's Republic of China, working together with the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 原中央军事委员会的军事工作机关，是全军军事工作的领导机关。在2015年深化国防和军队改革中被撤销，改组为中央军委联合参谋部。
description.en: The former military affairs organ of the Central Military Commission and the leading organ for the military work of the entire army. It was abolished in the 2015 reform of national defense and the military, and reorganized into the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission.

en: Deepening national defense and military reform

description.zh-cn: 2015年起由习近平主导的中国人民解放军的军事改革，旨在提高军队的联合作战能力和现代化水平。该改革导致了中国人民解放军总参谋部的撤销和中央军委联合参谋部的成立。
description.en: A military reform of the People's Liberation Army led by Xi Jinping starting in 2015, aimed at improving the military's joint operational capabilities and modernization. This reform led to the dissolution of the PLA General Staff Department and the establishment of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，中央军委委员，现任中央军委联合参谋部参谋长。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, member of the Central Military Commission, and current Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任中央军委联合参谋部副参谋长。
description.en: General of the PLA Ground Force, current Deputy Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，现任中央军委联合参谋部副参谋长。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the PLA Air Force, current Deputy Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，现任中央军委联合参谋部副参谋长。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the PLA, current Deputy Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军少将，现任中央军委联合参谋部参谋长助理。
description.en: Rear Admiral of the PLA Navy, current Assistant to the Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军火箭军少将，现任中央军委联合参谋部参谋长助理。
description.en: Major General of the PLA Rocket Force, current Assistant to the Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军少将，现任中央军委联合参谋部参谋长助理。
description.en: Rear Admiral of the PLA Navy, current Assistant to the Chief of the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

nodes.id: 中央军委纪委驻军委联合参谋部纪检组

zh-cn: 中央军委纪委驻军委联合参谋部纪检组

description.zh-cn: 由中央军委纪律检查委员会派驻中央军委联合参谋部的纪律检查机构。
description.en: Discipline inspection body dispatched by the CMC Discipline Inspection Commission to the Joint Staff Department of the CMC.

nodes.id: 中央军委纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中央军委纪律检查委员会
en: Discipline Inspection Commission of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 负责维护军队纪律和监督检查的专门机构。
description.en: A specialized body responsible for maintaining military discipline and supervision.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，中央军委联合参谋部所在地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission is located.

relationships.source: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央军委联合参谋部是中央军事委员会的下属机构。
description.en: The Joint Staff Department is a subordinate body of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央军委联合参谋部是中央军事委员会的下属机构。
description.en: The Joint Staff Department is a subordinate body of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中，改组成立了中央军委联合参谋部。
description.en: During the deepening of national defense and military reform, the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission was reorganized and established.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中，中国人民解放军总参谋部被撤销。
description.en: During the deepening of national defense and military reform, the General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army was abolished.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会联合参谋部的前身是中国人民解放军总参谋部，并由其主要机构改组而成。
description.en: The predecessor of the Joint Staff Department of the Central Military Commission was the General Staff Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, and it was reorganized from its main bodies.
